messages.message:
Oh hey, I am <!subteam^S07855GV3GV> this week! Here is an update on tests that I've seen failing:

• @danny.lan create-delete-app is failing here (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13710/overview/68ba3317-8ba4-4a8e-a49f-7bb6b6b2e76f/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1725909461981.9&att=1) because the project doesn't load fast enough
• @Travis sign-up failed because there was an uncaught exception error that sample files failed to be added. I assume this is just an issue with the environment not having sample projects set up? Can you make it so that that error is caught and we don't see this again?
• @Weiming Wu (and @danny.lan you're listed in tests.json?) view-home-page (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13696/overview/a49b2425-3320-4f0c-811d-99d8f81411e0?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1) is failing (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13693/test-results/82cfef1c-4d75-41cb-8aed-d00a18aad8a5) because of timeouts a lot
• @Subash @Aayush converse-app times out a couple (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13703/overview/f70fb331-49e7-4599-859b-1dcc27a297b1?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1) times (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13699/test-results/d986c929-d8a6-4455-a4d9-4c8613f9aad8) this morning (and so did converse-crud (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/13699/overview/acb0c4f5-6107-4c36-b0eb-7b368a13c451?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1))

`view-home-page` and the converse tests timeout when there are too many projects, I have a script to clean that up manually that I ran earlier but we should make a more permanent solution like the build cleanup cypress test I wrote previously, but for converse
sign up failed? curious how that touches with sample files, :thinking_face:
